section.title: Description
section.p: "Identifies the content profile supported by the electronic health record destination. A content profile may be necessary to support those services which demand a content wrapper." - ONC S&I Clinical Element Data Dictionary (CEDD), March 2012.

stentry.p: "A coded value that identifies, if appropriate, the content profile supported by the service." - ONC S&I Clinical Element Data Dictionary (CEDD), March 2012.
"A coded value that identifies, if appropriate, additional constraints on this ContentProfile" - ONC S&I Clinical Element Data Dictionary (CEDD), March 2012.
"The version(s) of the content profile supported" - ONC S&I Clinical Element Data Dictionary (CEDD), March 2012.
